page.title: 08Muslims in South Bradford.
page.content:
I am a Muslim boy,thirteen years of age.My life consists of arising before dawn and washing myself.I read the early morning prayer and the{Holy {Koran}for 10 to 15 minutes.I go to sleep again and get up at 7.30am.We eat lunch at 12.10 which is not meat, unless the blood has been drained and a short prayer has been said over the dying animal.We call this{Halal meat. At 5 o'clock I go to the{Mosque}for one hour to learn to read our Holy Koran.I also read another prayer.When I return home I do my homework and have dinner at 8.00pm.I read 2 more prayers,1 before sundown and one after.Then I go to bed.
A Muslim pupil of Ryan Middle School.
